original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that David his father had done.
korean_text: 히스기야가 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 행실과 같이 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord
according to all that David his father had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗이 행한 모든 것에 따라
